message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good amount.
I'm willing to be fair, Alice, but your last offer was too lopsided. Let's split it closer to even.
Bob, time is running out and inflation is eating our money. This offer is a compromise, let's close the deal.
Alice, I need you to meet me closer to the middle. This is a fair offer considering the inflation.
Bob, this is cutting it close.  I'm offering a bit more to settle this fairly before inflation eats more of our potential gains.
Alice, we're running out of time! I'm meeting you in the middle.  Take this deal before inflation makes it irrelevant!
Bob, we're down to the wire! This is practically a 50/50 split considering inflation. Take it before we both lose!
